comment: increasing the wheat on this one (10-20% is to style), that will be higher, munich isnt normal for kolsch, it is for alt. dry hopping this one per bons want.

doubling this and splitting with ed wright for the brew in at robs, mash, stir and bring to mashout, run off clear then run off fast, add water, stir and get to mashout again, rest for 10 min then stir again, runoff till clear then run it all of fast! looking for 13 gallons
finished way too high because i mashed way too high (got distracted at the brew in), lower the wheat next time and leave others the same, mash low.
